function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Construction workers being exposed to covid-19 due to colleagues testing positive and continuing to work","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with mask mandates in the construction industry","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of regular communication between construction workers and managers regarding covid-19 concerns","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or outdated information from osha, cdc, and agc guidelines may lead to ineffective safety practices.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Qualitative descriptive analysis may not fully and accurately capture the health and safety concerns of construction workers.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Effectiveness of the 100 health and safety practices is not fully assessed, leaving room for ineffective practices to be implemented.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in built environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding and congestion in public spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of contagious diseases through tourism","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased travel anxiety due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic damage to the global tourism market","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Travel anxiety increases with travel-related risks.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health-related risks influence choice of destination and tourism provider.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of infectious diseases affects travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 beliefs influence vacation plans.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infectious diseases impact travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The occurrence of the covid-19 pandemic has led to general fear.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long incubation period of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in tourist arrivals due to virus outbreaks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Epidemics and pandemics leading to public response and increased stress levels","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anxiety as a response to stressful situations","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influences of risk perception on consumer behavior in tourism","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
